snippet.title: Sapper - Defuse The Bomb Simulator – Release Date Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Palms are sweaty, knees weak, arms are heavy, the clock is ticking
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1083070/Sapper__Defuse_The_Bomb_Simulator/
Sapper: Defuse the Bomb Simulator is coming to Steam on March 11 2021. The game will come out in 11 languages:
- English
- Polish
- Russian
- French
- German
- Italian
- Brazilian Portuguese
- Spanish
- Japanese
- Turkish
- Simplified Chinese


Developer Social Media
Twitter - https://twitter.com/livemotiongames​

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/LiveMotionGa...​
Discord - https://discord.gg/xPCKhjGuQd

Publisher Social Media: https://linktr.ee/GamingFactorySA
